ResearchProjectDef.label: genetic engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the basics of genetic engineering. With this research you can begin experimenting on the most basic creatures (tier 1), and breed hybrids to conquer the world. The Genetic Extraction Table allows you to extract genetic samples from creatures, and build empty incubators. The GenePod is where this samples are combined into filled incubators. Reptiles and Insectoids are tier 2, and need more research. Thrumbos and mechanoids are tier 3, and need even more advanced research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: insectoid genome
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to extract genetic material from alien insectoid species. This opens up experimenting with insectoid hybrids (tier 2).

ResearchProjectDef.label: reptilian genome
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to extract genetic material from reptiles. This opens up experimenting with reptilian hybrids (tier 2).

ResearchProjectDef.label: humanoid genetic engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows humanoid gene extraction, and allows mixing of human and animal DNA to create hybrid human-animal implants. All these implants are created in a Tissue Growing Vat

ResearchProjectDef.label: hybrid implantology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Opens up experimenting with animal hybrid implants, used to improve your hybrid creatures with incredibly weird combinations. These hybrid implants are all created in a Tissue Growing Vat, and can be also used in base, non-hybrid animals (modded animals need a patch).

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced genetic engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Advanced Gene Pod, and allows extraction and mixing of thrumbo genes with other creatures (tier 3).

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced mechanite bio-integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows extraction of active mechanites from hostile mechanoids to mix them with genes with other creatures (tier 3). Mechanoid hybrids also need a mechanoid interface chips, which can be obtained from crashed mechanoid ships (both psychic and poison).

ResearchProjectDef.label: animal enrichment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to improve existing animals and create better adapted versions of them, known as Paragons. Unlocks the Paragon Serum Extraction Table, used to extract Paragon Serum from normal animals, as well as the Animal Enrichment Center, used to fill incubators with these serums.

ResearchProjectDef.label: age drugs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to accelerate the growth of your animals. Age Pills can be fed to animals to increase their age significantly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: animal control
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mind control technology that allows you to directly interact with your creatures, unlocking player-controllable special abilities for each hybrid family.
